md:
giải nghĩa từ "stir" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Stir (verb) : khuấy, trộn, quấy
	+ Meaning: to move something around in a circular motion, especially in a liquid or mixture.
	+ Example: "Stir the mixture well before pouring it into the mold."
	+ Related words: mix, blend, whip, beat
* Stir (noun) : sự khuấy động, sự quấy nhiễu
	+ Meaning: a feeling of excitement or interest.
	+ Example: "The news of the surprise party created a stir among the guests."
	+ Related words: commotion, uproar, fuss, excitement

Note: The verb "stir" can also mean to cause someone to feel a strong emotion, such as anger or excitement. For example: "The politician's speech stirred up a lot of controversy."
html:
giải nghĩa từ "stir" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  • Stir (verb) : khuấy, trộn, quấy
    • Meaning: to move something around in a circular motion, especially in a liquid or mixture.
    • Example: "Stir the mixture well before pouring it into the mold."
    • Related words: mix, blend, whip, beat
  • Stir (noun) : sự khuấy động, sự quấy nhiễu
    • Meaning: a feeling of excitement or interest.
    • Example: "The news of the surprise party created a stir among the guests."
    • Related words: commotion, uproar, fuss, excitement

Note: The verb "stir" can also mean to cause someone to feel a strong emotion, such as anger or excitement. For example: "The politician's speech stirred up a lot of controversy."
